deal.title: Save 50% at Bado’s Cucina

deal.title: Save 56% at Cosmetic Solutions
deal.description: Permanent Eyeliner on Upper and Lower Eyelids. Limit 1 per purchaser, 1 additional as gift • Limit 1 voucher per person • Valid for natural looks only; not valid for touch-ups or return visits • All services must be redeemed during a single visit by same customer

deal.title: Save 49% at "Dixie's Tupperware Party"
deal.description: $20 to See Pittsburgh CLO’s “Dixie’s Tupperware Party” at The Cabaret at Theater Square (Up to $44.75 Value). Valid only for option purchased. Must purchase together to sit together. CLO Cabaret is the issuer of tickets. No specific seating requests can be accommodated. Must provide first and last name, and shipping address at checkout, which Groupon will provide to facilitate redemption of voucher. Refundable only on day of purchase. Discount reflects Pittsburgh CLO's current ticket prices-price may differ on day of the event. Tickets will be mailed by August 24th.

deal.title: Save 63% at The Hott Spot Extreme Wellness

Valid only for option purchased. Appointment required. 24hr cancellation notice required. Must use promotional value in 1 visit. May redeem 2-pack option over 2 visits. All services must be used by the same person.

deal.title: Save 50% at ReJeneSys Aesthetics Center

deal.title: Save 71% at Glow Fitness Studio
